Raleigh.Garner, North Carolina: Garner is a town in Wake County, North Carolina, United States and a suburb of Raleigh. The population was estimated to be 27,814 as of July 1, 2014. The US Office of Management and Budget includes Garner as a part of the Raleigh-Durham-Chapel Hill Combined Statistical Area, which had a population of 1,998,808 as of U.S. Census 2012 Population Estimates.
